publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3475 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Lead Committee—That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 1 Committee be designated as lead committee in consideration of the following regulations— the Criminal Legal Aid (Scotland) (Fees) Amendment (No.2) Regulations 2002 (SSI 2002/440);the Criminal Legal Aid (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2002 (SSI 2002/441); andthe Criminal Legal Aid (Fixed Payments) (Scotland) Amendment (No.2) Regulations 2002 (SSI 2002/442). Supported by: Euan Robson*
